results.title: Romantic Mood Maker
results.description: Your ideal type is someone who creates romantic atmospheres! You want a partner who remembers anniversaries, prepares surprises, and doesn't hesitate to express love. You're happiest with someone who makes every day special with sweet words and actions.
results.advice: Your partner's way of expressing love might be different. Cherish even small expressions of affection.

results.title: Fun Energizer
results.description: Your ideal type is a cheerful person who always makes you laugh! You want a partner with great humor and positive energy. You're happiest with someone who can make any situation enjoyable.
results.advice: Sometimes serious conversations are needed too. Find a balance between humor and seriousness.

results.title: Intellectual Soulmate
results.description: Your ideal type is an intellectual person you can have deep conversations with! You want a partner who can discuss various topics, respects each other's thoughts, and grows together. You're happiest with someone who shares mental connections.
results.advice: Emotional connection is important too. Share feelings beyond just logic.

results.title: Adventure Companion
results.description: Your ideal type is an adventurous person to share new experiences with! You want a partner who isn't afraid of travel, challenges, and trying new things. You're happiest with someone you can explore the world with and create memories.
results.advice: Stability and rest are also necessary. Sometimes take time to relax and recharge.

results.title: Warm Protector
results.description: Your ideal type is a considerate person who warmly embraces you! You want a partner who pays attention to details, stays by your side in tough times, and provides security. You're happiest with someone who becomes your sanctuary of peace.
results.advice: Don't just depend on them - aim for a relationship where you care for each other.

results.title: Artistic Soul
results.description: Your ideal type is someone with artistic sensibility! You want a partner with unique tastes, a creative perspective, and who pursues beauty. You're happiest with someone you can enjoy cultural activities and share emotions with.
results.advice: Consider practical aspects too. Balance between dreams and reality is important.

results.title: Classic Gentleman/Lady
results.description: Your ideal type is someone with traditional manners and dignity! You want a partner who is polite, responsible, and can plan a stable future together. You're happiest with someone you can trust.
results.advice: Sometimes enjoy spontaneous fun too. Unplanned happiness exists.
